pages.md:
# LARGE INDICATORS MODE (EVF)

Select **ON** to display large indicators in the electronic viewfinder. The indicators displayed can be selected using **SCREEN SET-UP > LARGE INDICATORS DISP. SETTING**.

!Large Indicators Mode

- **OFF**: Standard display.
- **ON**: Large indicators display.

> ðŸ’¡ **Note:**
> - Some icons are not displayed when **ON** is selected for LARGE INDICATORS MODE (EVF) (see page 17).

> ðŸ’¡ **Tip:**
> - If LARGE INDICATORS MODE is assigned to a function button, the button can be used to toggle LARGE INDICATORS MODE on (**ON**) and off (**OFF**) (see page 385).
